column4: what do I do when my wireless card decides that it doesn't exist?
try to convince it that it does.. see !threaten and !ifyoudon'tstartworkingnowI'llcry =)
does it still exist in lspci or lsusb or similar?
I can't really help you with wifi more than the basic stuff.. it worked out of the box on my laptop, which I am ever so thankful for. Try !wifi or !wireless for some general help from ubotu
